scripts.local:run:fundamentals: cross-env MODELS=gpt-5 TEST_FILTER=000-fundamentals npm run local:run
scripts.local:run:one: cross-env MODELS=gpt-5 TEST_FILTER=000-fundamentals/000 npm run local:run
scripts.local:run: cross-env DISABLE_BRAINTRUST=1 VERBOSE_INFO_LOGS=1 LOCAL_RESULTS=local_results.jsonl npm run run:evals
scripts.braintrust:fundamentals: cross-env MODELS=gpt-5 TEST_FILTER=000-fundamentals npm run braintrust:run
scripts.braintrust:run:one: cross-env MODELS=gpt-5 TEST_FILTER=000-fundamentals/000 npm run braintrust:run
scripts.braintrust:run: cross-env LOCAL_RESULTS=local_results.jsonl VERBOSE_INFO_LOGS=1 npm run run:evals
